Package fr.ens.biologie.codeGeneration

package fr.ens.biologie.codeGeneration

Utilities for code generation.

We provide here a simple - one could say minimal - toolkit for generating code. Two classes, ClassGenerator and MethodGenerator represent a class and a method to be generated. Code generation usually starts by instantiating ClassGenerator and populating it with specifications for fields, methods, etc. Once the instance is in a satisfactory state, a call to its ClassGenerator.asText(...) method will generate java code as a String, that can be saved to a file and checked with a JavaCompiler for syntax errors. Other classes comprise basic utilities and standard comments useful in code generation tasks.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 18 mai 2021
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ClassGenerator
    A simple java class generator.
    CodeGenerationUtils
    Utility methods for code generation.
    Comments
    A class for defining generic comments in generated code files.
    JavaCompiler
    A class to compile a .java file to a .class file.
    JavaUtilities
     
    MethodGenerator
    A simple method code generator for java classes.
